title: EthDoo
author: EthDoo
content: Hello , user ! Its my first topic on this forum , i am good player in casino and love this sites) . I check more sites and lost/win money and i search betfury for few-days ago . I dep and win every ( i no lost money in this casino , and i play in + ) i withdraw with this casino 5,10,20k$ for very fast , and yesterday site say me when i dep 1500$ and withdraw 2200$+ . "AntiFraud checkUsually AntiFraud check takes up to 24hours, in special cases 72 hours and more." But , i use 1 address for dep and this address for withdraw , i check my address for aml , my address not have risk , but betfury wait my lose) And now i have question , why when i dep 20k+ and withdraw more 40k$ you dont check me ? Why you not check my dep for 5,10,20k? My problem i every win and betfury think¬† not pay . I want withdraw my money from you casino . User2775101 - my user id . Now betfury support say me i need wait max up 7 days for check me  Its trash , wait 7 days for what ? Aml check its max 1 min , or you wait when i¬† again dep money and still ?!

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: EthDoo on July 19, 2022, 12:09:48 PM<snip>When you keep winning then it's a red alert for casino. Casinos are not charity but business. Strategically winning every bet for long streak is not possible too. It's not the AML and KYC only, they will check your betting behaviors, the market your placed bets, time of placing bets and many more factors before giving you a final decision. Give them their time.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 19, 2022, 12:19:24 PMQuote from: EthDoo on July 19, 2022, 12:09:48 PM<snip>When you keep winning then it's a red alert for casino. Casinos are not charity but business. Strategically winning every bet for long streak is not possible too. It's not the AML and KYC only, they will check your betting behaviors, the market your placed bets, time of placing bets and many more factors before giving you a final decision. Give them their time.Why checking betting behavior? I do not think that will be the reason. Just that betting sites do more check about the deposit after the depositor win and want to withdraw.I will advice EthDoo to wait for the days they said and keep this thread active about it.

comments.author: P2PECS
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 19, 2022, 12:19:24 PMQuote from: EthDoo on July 19, 2022, 12:09:48 PM<snip>When you keep winning then it's a red alert for casino. Casinos are not charity but business. Strategically winning every bet for long streak is not possible too. It's not the AML and KYC only, they will check your betting behaviors, the market your placed bets, time of placing bets and many more factors before giving you a final decision. In this case I think it is a statistically anomalous winning streak, and that is why they have started to investigate it. I don't know Betfury but if it is a legit site, after checking that the OP has done nothing wrong (if so), they will refund the money. Quote from: Oshosondy on July 19, 2022, 12:46:18 PMI will advice EthDoo to wait for the days they said and keep this thread active about it.Me too.

Quoting for visibility.You can update the OP and add the images. Maybe this is a case or maybe not. I am still waiting to see the development and the response from Betfury, if they have any forum account.Quote from: Oshosondy on July 19, 2022, 12:46:18 PMWhy checking betting behavior? I do not think that will be the reason. Just that betting sites do more check about the deposit after the depositor win and want to withdraw.It's a nice question and many fails to understand the reason. There are good reasons for casinos not to check when there are no win or an account is not making huge profit. A casino has thousands of bets from clients everyday. It's not possible for them to go and check every bet unless something alerts them.

Nobody calls you a hacker or scammer but when you post something here in the scam section you need to post all your proofs and pieces of evidence so we can have a valid conversation, we can rely on your hearsay and admit it as true, now that you posted all your screenshots this makes your claim valid it stated that you'll have to wait 72 hours or more.I know the eagerness but it's the casino rules that they are implementing and since you are playing here you have to abide by it.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 19, 2022, 06:00:29 PMThere are good reasons for casinos not to check when there are no win or an account is not making huge profit. A casino has thousands of bets from clients everyday. It's not possible for them to go and check every bet unless something alerts them.When you sign up for a casino you agreed to their terms of service and rules so they expect you to abide by them and make your account in good standing, if you win its the casino's prerogative to check if the account is clean and there is no violation, you just have to check from time to time that you are playing fair, so in case you are under investigation you will not worry and assured that you can get your withdrawal because your account is clean from cheating and violation.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: EthDoo on July 19, 2022, 12:09:48 PMUser2775101 - my user id . Now betfury support say me i need wait max up 7 days for check me  Its trash , wait 7 days for what ? Aml check its max 1 min , or you wait when i¬† again dep money and still ?! It's a sad story, I should say, but let's give them the 7 days. The good thing is that support has assured you the check will take up to 7 days at most. I don't think it's just AML checks. They are probably looking into your betting patterns to be sure you are not cheating.With what you have experience with them, once you get your money, you could choose to play with another casino to avoid such inconveniences of having to wait for 7 days for checks to be complete.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on July 20, 2022, 11:52:12 PMso in case you are under investigation you will not worry and assured that you can get your withdrawal because your account is clean from cheating and violation.If a casino does not intent to scam their user then they have nothing to worry but when a casino selectively target their users and wants to not pay them then it's difficult. They can always hide their face behind the terms and conditions even if you feel yourself that you never done anything wrong that could violate the terms. Quote from: AnotherAlt on July 21, 2022, 02:30:36 AMWhile you can vouch for BetFury, I request you to check this Why crypto iGaming still has a long way to go.. and this BTCGOSU ends ‚Äúpartnership‚Äù with BetFury with immediate effect. This is shady from Betfury. Good to see GOSU earned trust but I do not take words from a review site as guaranteed. They have conflict of interest. After all they are affiliated with gambling sites, it's their revenue source. If they do not like each others for some reason then they can use their rep against each others. You have to understand that money drives everything. If GOSU was a non-profit organization then their opinions would have more value for me than now.

comments.author: AnotherAlt
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 22, 2022, 11:18:40 AMGood to see GOSU earned trust but I do not take words from a review site as guaranteed. They have conflict of interest. After all they are affiliated with gambling sites, it's their revenue source. If they do not like each others for some reason then they can use their rep against each others. You have to understand that money drives everything. If GOSU was a non-profit organization then their opinions would have more value for me than now.While I do not deny anything you've said above, Still, people will trust Gosu and not BetFury because often we see scam accusations against casinos and not against a review site. IDK if you have already read the article; it is worth reading if you want to try BetFury. I believe People trust Gosu because they use their service, and Gosu helps users to fix problems with casinos.
